Installation
============

Dependencies
************
=============================================      ==================
     Features                                       Dependancy
=============================================      ==================
``Scripting Language``                              Python 3.0+
``HTTP(S)``                                         requests
``Command-Line Option and argument parsing``        Click
``Database Used``                                   SQLite3
``Display Bookmarks in Table``                      beautifultable
=============================================      ==================

From a package manager
**********************
* `PyPI <https://pypi.org/project/readit/0.2/>`_ (pip3 install --user readit).


Release Packages
****************
Packages for Fedora are availabe with the `latest release <https://github.com/projectreadit/readit/releases/tag/v0.2>`_.
